name: Make Your Way (Demo)
description:
The apocalypse has come and passed; the waters rose and swallowed all but a few bits of land owned by the rich Lords who control food supplies. A few people have saved up enough to create floating gardens which they sail over the world's oceans to the coral reefs and floating cities to make new homes-- and you are one such person. You are so close to freedom, but you must make the perilous journey across the sea to reach your destination, and survival is hard business. 

A game I did for my college's Twin-a-Thon. I want to put more stuff in it, so it'll probably receive some updates eventually, including art.
